page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our block consists of virtually nothing but farmland.The land is undulating,fairly steep in places with some farmers qualifying for Hill Subsidies.There is some mixed woodland and the area is rich in wildlife. There are hardly any public amminities.We have no villages or towns and any housing is privately owned.Within the area,we have seven farms as we know them plus one croft.There is only one main road _ A701 Dumfries/Edinburgh.Until the 1960's,there was a very scenic railway line through the area Dumfries / Lockerbie.This was closed and all the track has been lifted.Some of the line has now been reclaimed for arable land.
